mapper.select: SELECT secondhand.productID, secondhand.productTitle,secondhand.productDescription, secondhand.productType,secondhand.time,secondhand.price,secondhand.productCondition,secondhand.contact,secondhand.imagesJSON,secondhand.delivery, user.avatar as sellerAvatar, user.nickname as sellerNickname FROM secondhand INNER JOIN user on secondhand.userID = user.userID ORDER BY secondhand.time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
